trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of Windows claims that are associated with an entity.
trans-unit.target: 表示与某个实体关联的 Windows 声明的集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref> class by using the Windows user identity specified by the <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>类通过使用指定的 Windows 用户标识<xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The claims representing the Windows groups to which this user belongs are added to the claim set.
trans-unit.target: 表示此用户所属 Windows 组的声明添加到声明集。

trans-unit.source: The expiration time is set to 10 hours.
trans-unit.target: 过期时间设置为 10 小时。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"></xref> that specifies the Windows identity.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"> </xref>指定 Windows 标识。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"></xref> that specifies the Windows identity.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"> </xref>指定 Windows 标识。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the claims representing the Windows groups to which this user belongs; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>包含表示 Windows 组与此用户所属; 的声明否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"> </xref>指定 Windows 标识。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the expiration time for the claim set.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>，指定声明集的过期时间。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>包含与此用户所属; 的 Windows 组否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>，指定声明集的过期时间。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"> </xref>指定 Windows 标识。

trans-unit.source: The authentication type for the Windows Identity.
trans-unit.target: Windows 标识身份验证类型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the Windows groups to which this user belongs; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>，指定声明集的过期时间。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of claims in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取此集合中的声明数。

trans-unit.source: The number of claims in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 此集合中的声明数。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 释放使用的所有资源<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Call the Dispose method when you are finished using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>.
trans-unit.target: 在完成使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>时调用的 Dispose 方法

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法离开<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>中不可用状态。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>

trans-unit.source: After calling the Dispose method, you must release all references to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> so that the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> occupied.
trans-unit.target: 调用 Dispose 方法后，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>，以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>占用。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call the Dispose method before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 始终在发布到<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>最后一个引用之前调用的 Dispose 方法

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它所使用的资源不会释放之前垃圾回收器调用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>对象的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>

trans-unit.source: Gets the expiration time for this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取此的到期时间<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> in which this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref> expires.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>此<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>过期。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Searches for the claim that matches the specified claim type and rights in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 搜索指定的声明类型和权限中匹配的声明<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the properties of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes> class to specify the `claimType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用的属性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes>类指定`claimType`参数。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes>

trans-unit.source: The uniform resource identifier (URI) of a claim type.
trans-unit.target: 声明类型的统一资源标识符 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the right associated with the new claim.
trans-unit.target: 与新声明关联的权限的 URI。

trans-unit.source: A<xref uid="langword_csharp_ System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Claim>" name=" System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Claim>" href=""></xref> object that enables you to enumerate the claims that match the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: A<xref uid="langword_csharp_ System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Claim>" name=" System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Claim>" href=""> </xref>对象，可用于枚举符合指定的条件的声明。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601> that can be used to enumerate the Windows claims in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601>可用于枚举中的 Windows 声明<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601> that can be used to enumerate the Windows claims in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601>可用于枚举中的 Windows 声明<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the issuer for this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取此颁发者<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The issuer for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> is <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet.Windows%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>为<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet.Windows%2A>。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet.Windows%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> a 颁发者

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref> that represents the issuer of this claim set.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"> </xref>表示此声明集的颁发者。

trans-unit.source: Gets the claim for the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定索引的声明。

trans-unit.source: The index of the Windows claim to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的 Windows 声明的索引。

trans-unit.source: The claim for the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引的声明。

trans-unit.source: Returns this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回此<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Windows identity for this claim set.
trans-unit.target: 获取此声明集的 Windows 标识。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"></xref> for this claim set.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"> </xref>此声明集。
